items.title: Aston Martin One-77
items.description: A rare masterpiece — hand-built 7.3L V12, carbon fiber body, 750 horsepower. Only 77 units ever made.

items.title: Bugatti Veyron Grand Sport Vitesse
items.description: 8.0L quad-turbo W16 engine, top speed over 400 km/h, iconic black & white finish.

items.title: Ferrari LaFerrari
items.description: Hybrid supercar combining a V12 engine and electric motor. Signature red with butterfly doors.

items.title: Ferrari F60 America
items.description: Limited-edition convertible built to celebrate 60 years of Ferrari in North America.

items.title: Koenigsegg Agera RS
items.description: 5.0L twin-turbo V8 engine producing 1160 hp, record-breaking Swedish hypercar.

items.title: Koenigsegg CCXR Trevita
items.description: Carbon fiber diamond weave body, limited to only two units, 4.8L twin-turbo V8.

items.title: Lamborghini Veneno
items.description: Built for Lamborghini’s 50th anniversary, features 6.5L V12 engine and radical aero design.

items.title: Lykan Hypersport
items.description: Middle East’s first hypercar — diamond-encrusted headlights, 3.7L twin-turbo engine, 780 hp.

items.title: Pagani Huayra
items.description: Italian artistry meets AMG power — carbon-titanium monocoque and butterfly doors.

items.title: Zenvo ST1
items.description: Danish hypercar with a 6.8L V8 engine producing 1100 horsepower. Handcrafted excellence.
